metadata.title: CVE-2020-1746 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Ansible Engine affecting Ansible Engine versions2.7.x before 2.7.17 and 2.8.x before 2.8.11 and 2.9.x before 2.9.7 as wellas Ansible Tower before and including versions 3.4.5 and 3.5.5 and 3.6.3when the ldap_attr and ldap_entry community modules are used. The issuediscloses the LDAP bind password to stdout or a log file if a playbook taskis written using the bind_pw in the parameters field. The highest threatfrom this vulnerability is data confidentiality.

criterions.comment: ansible package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
